无论是游戏本身，还是游戏的制作组都值得称赞。
本身是一个恐怖游戏，不过当你当你适应这款游戏以后，它的欢乐胜过带给你的恐惧（萌新视角：黎明杀机，习惯的玩家视角：农场主大战偷电贼）因为每个角色都是玩家扮演的所以你会遇到各种各样的情况：能溜屠夫几个发电机的人皇，瑟瑟发抖蹲蘑菇的萌新，开局四趟的护士长……并没有人规定逃生者一定要出门，也没有人规定屠夫一定要完杀，你们开心就好（XD好了，虽然这么说，但还是请把我从树上放下来，我还能修）

制作组能认真听取我们的意见实在是太棒了！而且还乐于和大家沟通互动:D不得不说这是我最喜欢的一个制作组了

感谢黎明杀机，感谢制作组。

对了，为了正常游戏我还是希望屠夫还是不要上来就贴脸守钩子比较好（除非有人作死挑衅你= =人作死就会死还是要让他们知道的）多练练追人可以得到更多血点，上段位更快，乐趣更多。
逃生者带四个红齿轮我是真的看不懂= -进去啪啪啪4个发电机全开你们图个什么。。。
萌新多练习修发电机不会错的！

很不錯的一款遊戲（別問我為啥繁體 gta5玩家） 第一篇評測。紅色技能還在的時候入的坑，看著殺雞的不斷優化，製作組對國人的誠意，在steam里其他恐怖遊戲都是很難得的。可惜的是國內對於這類遊戲不支持，導致人氣下滑，對新人不太友好，導致人數流失。但在今天我還在看付導、624、頭魚的視頻，真的很希望這款遊戲有著第二春，為製作組點贊（I this we did prety good job so far（滑稽））
loves it

So, let me just say, I really enjoy this game quite a lot, but Freddy makes it just unfun to play, he's practically impossible to beat, his dream state lasts the entire game unless hooked, which you'll get hooked every time and then he'll put you in the dream state...again...needless to stay, I think i'll be playing other games until he's patched. I understand yall like to make new killers overpowered when first released, because, more money, but like, this is just a bit excessive. As of right now, I'll say to stick away, Freddy is in practically every game now anyways.

Nothing about this game makes sense its all about the game developers supporting one side of there gamers by having everything with the survivors nerfed while the killers get buffed, the survivors hit boxes are so messed up but the game developers wont do anything to fix it, and they wont do anything about camping and tunneling because its "part of the game" while theres nothing survivors can do but its whatever because at least one player basis is happy. The developers need to stop worrying about making money and they need to actually make a good game

Edit: Gonna change it to recommend because i really do enjoy the game though.
I really wanted to get into this game but, This get's boring fast and it's mostly a grind. 

Survivors objective:Start generators then escape. There is no other game modes.

Killer objective:Hit a survivor twice, Hook them. wait for others to help that survivor that got hooked, hit those survivors that are trying to help him them then hook those survivors. Get as many survivors on hooks as you can..
Killer hits a survivor once then he/she is slowed for like a second? How does that make any sense? When you use the blink ability on one of the killers you are slowed after you use it and theres no cooldown, A cooldown would be really good but instead why make it so your slowed and you cant hit anyone afterwards?
When you hook someone, The hook goes straight through the upper left of the body were your heart is, DOESNT Make sense on how you can get hooked there afew times and don't die, Game logic. But ofc you die instantly after getting hooked afew times.
This game graphic wise looks stunning but it has issues, When you get hooked the hook moves through your body and it looks really unrealistic. Maybe it will get patched sooner or later? 
Also, When you want to play as a killer it will take like 4 minutes to find people? When you play as survivors and find a lobby you instantly find people. Thats great. Don't know why matchmaking takes so long as a killer.
3/10. I wanted to enjoy this game but, I hate how it's just one game mode and the killer matchmaking takes so long and that there's really nothing more to this game,
To me this game gets boring and it's annoying that you just repair generators then hear the killer then hide and repeat till you repaired all the generators. But, If you do like games like this then. I recommend it on sale.
I wanted a horror survivor multiplayer game but this isn't the one, It's really not scary at all, Well. The only time that i did got scared was i looked behind me and i saw a killer appear from invisible.
very good game
Awesome game! Very highly recommended

I have no respect for the moderation and development of this game. I've owned this game for a long time and while continuously playing it, I'm tired of learning of friends of mine and people who inspired me to play this game be unfairly banned.I can not support a game that will not actually improve. Listen to your community. I love this game when I play with my friends, but otherwise - this is not a well constructed game. I do have fun with it, nevertheless I can not recommend it.

This game is a lot of fun to play and equally terrifying. Survive with friends and Kill Your Friends modes offer plenty of replay value. Mechanically still broken in a lot of ways between collision and vaulting mechanics that are inconsistent.

If you are gonna buy the game, do it when you know that you'll have friends to play with and have a lot of patience or else it will NOT be worth it.

Positive side:
This game is really fun.
Fantasitc with friends.


Negitives:
Currently a Killer sided game.
There are WAY too many DLCs for this game. They dont make it worth it unless there are certain perks you want for your builds.
Emblem system keeps changing and confusing players.
Be aware that they change up perks and killer stats often.
When they release new killers/survivors they're aren't guarenteed to keep the same perks/benefits because they're almost guarnteed to be unbalanced.

The updates are getting worse and worse as time goes on.
They're more focused on getting money through cosmetics and the shrine is not worth purchasing things in anymore unless its a teachable you deserately want.
me tai weando po wn e weno el juego pero loh projramo mi ermanito de ciete anios 60fps da la puta mierda

Do you ever say to yourself "if i had a weapon right now i would kill these 4 people" well here is the perfect game!! 

Killer: slash, cut, saw, hit, smash, cripple, trap and whatever more !!

Ever watched a horror movie and wanted to get in it and outsmart the killer? then this is the perfect game!!

 survivor: teamwork, cunning, tools, perks, (also for killer!) wit, fast feed and sometimes willing to sacrifice for the greater good :D 

btw: don't listen to the guys typing "new killer is OP" ofcourse it is and it has always bin like that when a new killer entered the game so don't be misguided by those dudes. 

i played 10 hours at the time of this review and i have 5 killers on lvl 4, 3 survivors on lvl 4 and 2 on 3, it is very rarely you play a game twice> yes you can have the same map. but boxes and doors and such are almost never in the same place. in 10 hours i haven't play the same game twice :D wich is nice or else i get bored to fast. besides that i just had a good laugh putting people on hooks and it is also very satisfying to escape from a rampaging killer. i crawled over the escape line once :p

Game is awesome. 4 out of 5 stars.

Toxic players like all games.

Get a rush from being chased or chasing survivors.

Learn your jukes or you are dead.

People rather you die than them. Get used to it.

Killers will cry or face camp if you juke them or loop them.

Survivors will cry when they are the first one to die.

Face camping is toxic. Good players from killers and survivors laugh at you when you do it. (You also receive less bloodpoints when you do.)

Survivors will D/C if they get salty.

Find a playstyle that you like and learn it.

Flashlights suck if the person knows how to use it.

Last but not least, have fun and try not to be a huge turd sack. In the end, it is all about them bloodpoints.
Loose. Adapt. Overcome.

The new Nightmare on Elm Street DLC is awesome. I am usually a Doctor main, and when you play him you usually dont really have to look for survivors; you just sort of wait for them to scream. Now that Freddy is out I dont even have to wait around anymore. And the best part is I just get to see the survivor; like actually see them. I dont even have to look anymore :) it's like the game plays itself for me now when I play the killer. When you can see the survivor its just a matter of time until you catch up to them since your faster and all. So happy I can just  skip the hide part of the hide-and-seek core aspect this game holds. Would recomend this DLC to any killers that want to skip the majority of the work you have to do to as the killer.
recomendable muy bueno!

This game has devolved into a platform for 4 players to bully one player.  They've engineered it to funnel a constant stream of low skill players inevitably toward the high rank toxic squads no matter how un-fun that is.  They constantly buff survivors and give them more things to use against the killer, who now stands the same chance as a fart in the wind.  The only way the devs will get the idea is if all the killers stop playing.  SO, TL;DR, if you aren't playing survivor, play something else.

Als Killer ganz lustig im Soloplay, aber als Überlebender ist die Balance einfach für ein A*sch. Solange kein Voicechat implementiert wird gibt es nur einen Daumen runter. Wer mit Freunden über TS spielt ist es dennoch eine Kaufempfehlung, aber nur wenn es für die hälfte vom Kaufpreis angeboten wird.

No prostě Dead by Daylight. Co dodat, hra je vynikající s občasnými buggy (za +- 400h jsem zažil maximálně 5 buggů na vlastní oči). Hru doporučuji, není pay to win (= zaplať pro výhru), takže si zahrajete i když nemáte žádné dlc. Hru prostě doporuřuji. Je hodně o naučení se, jak to hrát. Prostě ze začátku (+- 50h) toho moc neuděláte, ale potom, když vás to bude bavit, rádi to zapnete (sám mám +- 400h a pořád mě to baví) a také vlástním všechny dlc. 9/10
Très bon jeu, à jouer entre amis ou en solo, le plaisir d'y jouer est toujours au rendez-vous.

Die DLC's zerstören das Spiel "free" killer sind im vergleich lächerlich schwach.
Beispiel :
Der Geist("free") kann sich unsichtbar machen(mit verzögerung und Geräusch) 
Freddy ist IMMER unsichtbar außer er verschleppt dich in die Traumwelt (man kann nur noch halb so schnell arbeiten dort und wird angezeigt)

Jetzt mal ehrlich was soll der mist.

Zudem gibt es ernste Probleme mit den Lobbys
Wenn der Killer leavt werden alle gegickt und man bekommt downranks(Unötig wie sonstwas).

Das Spiel hat viel Potenzial aber es wird zunehmend verschlimmbessert.
